attributes.action: Reduce taxation on Alcoholic draught beers sold and consumed on Licensed premises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The considerable debate about future tax increases on alcohol if applied will further deminish the number of pubs/clubs trading and employing many thousands of people who will lose their jobs.Draft beer drinkers do no damage.  To stop the binge drinking is easy enough 1) Dramatically increase the cost of alcopops to stop the idiots who run riots in town centres and stop promotions on spirits in any licensed premise 2) Allow off licences to sell only at 20% less than average pub price as determined between Local Councillors and The Fed Of Licensed Victuallers - ALCOHOLISM STARTS BY UNSUPERVISED DRINKING AT HOME-Beer drinkers on Licensed premises do not cause problems and deserve the right to enjoy this leisure and relaxing time after what is usally a days work and involves in the main older more mature people

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reduce taxation on Alcoholic draught beers sold and consumed on Licensed premises."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
